A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After a disappointing Force Awaken\, which to me was too similar to the original trilogy and rather play it too safe\, we see something new. I love the storyline of my childhood hero\, Luke Skywalker\, despite all the hate. Some questionable sequences\, and one forceful plot for a character change\, but other than that\, this is the Star Wars movie that has balls to not just please the theory-hunger fans\, but take the franchise in a new direction.
